annotations: "Bui Thi Hoa Technical Support Specialist - AZAPA ENGINEERING Da Nang Da Nang, Viet Nam - buithihoa3009@gmail.com - 0989012345 - linkedin.com/in/bui-thi-hoa-8901b2345 - github.com/buithihoa I am an Information Technology graduate with strong problem-solving skills and experience in providing technical support for software products.
